nodes.body: The darc flows for 17.11 and 17.12 are fully set up and the VS insertion flows are nonexistent - I disabled both and from now will make the releases manually until VS is ready to receive 17.12
Azure Pipelines successfully started running 1 pipeline(s).
Deleted unnecessary compatibility suppressions according to the CI error.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2,8 +2,8 @@
 <!-- Copyright (c) .NET Foundation and contributors. All rights reserved. Licensed under the MIT license. See License.txt in the project root for full license information. -->
 <Project>
   <PropertyGroup>
-    <VersionPrefix>17.11.0</VersionPrefix>
-    <PackageValidationBaselineVersion>17.8.3</PackageValidationBaselineVersion>
+    <VersionPrefix>17.12.0</VersionPrefix>
+    <PackageValidationBaselineVersion>17.11.0-preview-24318-05</PackageValidationBaselineVersion>

nodes.body: We discussed which version to put here with @rainersigwald It is published internally, unfortunately, we cannot put here any version published publicly - the latest are 17.10 versions only and we need 17.11 here.
